languages.text: {n}Что-то древнее и бесконечно осведомленное взирает на вас из-под маски, которая прежде была лицом Паскаля Ханейманна. Глубоким, вибрирующим, словно провод под напряжением, голосом оно произносит:{/n} "Коллектив Амарнат не успел поблагодарить тебя за сотрудничество, {name} фон Валанциус. Твоя {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}заслуга в свершении Реставрации{/d} не будет забыта".

{n}Something ancient and infinitely informed is looking at you from behind the mask that was once Pasqal Haneumann's face. In a deep voice vibrating like a live wire, it says,{/n} "The Amarnat Collective never found the time to thank you for your cooperation, {name} von Valancius. The {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}part you played in achieving the Restoration{/d} will not be forgotten."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то древнее и бесконечно осведомленное взирает на вас из-под маски, которая прежде была лицом Паскаля Ханейманна. Глубоким, вибрирующим, словно провод под напряжением, голосом оно произносит:{/n} "Коллектив Амарнат не успел поблагодарить тебя за сотрудничество, {name} фон Валанциус. Твоя {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}заслуга в свершении Реставрации{/d} не будет забыта".

The part you played in achieving the Restoration will not be forgotten."

languages.text: {n}某种古老而全知的存在，正透过帕斯卡·哈努曼昔日的面孔凝视着你。它发出了低沉的声音，仿佛电线在振动一样。{/n}“阿玛纳特聚合意识一直都没能找到时间感谢你的协助，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。{d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}你在实现复原这一过程中扮演了重要的角色{/d}，你的付出将永远被人铭记。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something ancient and infinitely informed is looking at you from behind the mask that was once Pasqal Haneumann's face. In a deep voice vibrating like a live wire, it says,{/n} "The Amarnat Collective never found the time to thank you for your cooperation, {name} von Valancius. The {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}part you played in achieving the Restoration{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡·哈努曼原本的脸已经被面具取代，某些古老又充满信息的东西正透过面具看着你。它发出了低沉的声音，仿佛电线在振动一样。{/n}“阿玛纳特聚合意识一直都没能找到时间感谢你的协助，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。你在实现复原这一过程中扮演了重要的角色，你的付出将永远被人铭记。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Algo antiguo con una cantidad de información ilimitada te mira desde la máscara que otrora fue la cara de Pasqal Haneumann. Con una voz profunda que vibra como un cable electrizado, proclama:{/n} «El Colectivo Amarnat no había tenido ocasión de agradecer su cooperación, {name} von Valancius. El {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}papel que desempeñó en la Restauración{/d} no caerá en el olvido».
languages.original_text: {n}Something ancient and infinitely informed is looking at you from behind the mask that was once Pasqal Haneumann's face. In a deep voice vibrating like a live wire, it says,{/n} "The Amarnat Collective never found the time to thank you for your cooperation, {name} von Valancius. The {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}part you played in achieving the Restoration{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo antiguo con una cantidad de información ilimitada te mira desde la máscara que otrora fue la cara de Pasqal Haneumann. Con una voz profunda que vibra como un cable electrizado, proclama:{/n} «El Colectivo Amarnat no había tenido ocasión de agradecer si cooperación, {name} von Valancius. El papel que desempeñó en la Restauración no caerá en el olvido».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}かつてパスカル・ヘニュマンの顔だった仮面の奥から、古代の、そして限りなく情報に満ちた何かがこちらを見ている。銅線が震えるかのような深い声で、それはこう告げた。{/n}「アマルナト集合体はあなたの協力に礼を言う暇がなかったようだ、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。あなたが{d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}復元において果たした役割{/d}は決して忘れられることはないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Something ancient and infinitely informed is looking at you from behind the mask that was once Pasqal Haneumann's face. In a deep voice vibrating like a live wire, it says,{/n} "The Amarnat Collective never found the time to thank you for your cooperation, {name} von Valancius. The {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}part you played in achieving the Restoration{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}かつてパスカル・ヘニュマンの顔だった仮面の奥から、古代の、そして限りなく情報に満ちた何かがこちらを見ている。銅線が震えるかのような深い声で、それはこう告げた。{/n}「アマルナト集合体はあなたの協力に礼を言う暇がなかったようだ、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。あなたが{d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}復元において果たした役割{/d}は決して忘れられることはないだろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Etwas Uraltes und unendlich Informiertes blickt dich von hinter der Maske an, die einst Pasqal Haneumanns Gesicht war. In einer tiefen Stimme, die wie ein unter Strom stehendes Kabel vibriert, sagt es:{/n} "Das Amarnat-Kollektiv hat nie die Zeit gefunden, Euch für Eure Kooperation zu danken, {name} von Valancius. Euer {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}Beitrag zur Wiederherstellung{/d} wird nicht vergessen werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Something ancient and infinitely informed is looking at you from behind the mask that was once Pasqal Haneumann's face. In a deep voice vibrating like a live wire, it says,{/n} "The Amarnat Collective never found the time to thank you for your cooperation, {name} von Valancius. The {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}part you played in achieving the Restoration{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}Etwas Uraltes und unendlich Informiertes blickt dich von hinter der Maske an, die einst Pasqal Haneumanns Gesicht war. In einer tiefen Stimme, die wie ein unter Strom stehendes Kabel vibriert, sagt es:{/n} "Das Amarnat-Kollektiv hat nie die Zeit gefunden, Euch für Eure Kooperation zu danken, {name} von Valancius. Euer Beitrag zum Erreichen der Restoration wird nicht vergessen werden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Derrière le masque qui était autrefois le visage de Pasqal Haneumann, un esprit ancien aux connaissances illimitées vous observe. D'une voix profonde et vibrante, il déclare :{/n} « Le collectif Amarnat n'a jamais trouvé le temps de vous remercier pour votre coopération, {name} von Valancius. Nous n'oublierons pas le {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}rôle que vous avez joué dans la Restauration{/d}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something ancient and infinitely informed is looking at you from behind the mask that was once Pasqal Haneumann's face. In a deep voice vibrating like a live wire, it says,{/n} "The Amarnat Collective never found the time to thank you for your cooperation, {name} von Valancius. The {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}part you played in achieving the Restoration{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}Derrière le masque qui était autrefois le visage de Pasqal Haneumann, un esprit ancien aux connaissances illimitées vous observe. D'une voix profonde et vibrante, il déclare :{/n} « Le collectif Amarnat n'a jamais trouvé le temps de vous remercier pour votre coopération, {name} von Valancius. Nous n'oublierons pas le rôle que vous avez joué dans la Restauration. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Something ancient and infinitely informed is looking at you from behind the mask that was once Pasqal Haneumann's face. In a deep voice vibrating like a live wire, it says,{/n} "The Amarnat Collective never found the time to thank you for your cooperation,  von Valancius. The part you played in achieving the Restoration will not be forgotten."

languages.text: {n}Kadim ve sonsuz bilgi sahibi bir şey, bir zamanlar Pasqal Haneumann'ın yüzü olan maskenin arkasından sana bakıyor. Duyulan ses, içinden akım geçerek titreyen bir tel misali derin çıkıyor.{/n} "Amarnat Bütünlüğü, iş birliğiniz için size teşekkür etme fırsatı hiç bulamamıştı {name} von Valancius. {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}Yeniden Yapılanma'nın başarıya ulaşmasında oynadığınız rol{/d} unutulmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Something ancient and infinitely informed is looking at you from behind the mask that was once Pasqal Haneumann's face. In a deep voice vibrating like a live wire, it says,{/n} "The Amarnat Collective never found the time to thank you for your cooperation, {name} von Valancius. The {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Amarnath}part you played in achieving the Restoration{/d} will not be forgotten."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadim ve sonsuz bilgi sahibi bir şey, bir zamanlar Pasqal Haneumann'ın yüzü olan maskenin arkasından sana bakıyor. İçinden akım geçerek titreyen bir tel gibi derin bir ses konuşuyor:{/n} "Amarnat Bütünlüğü, iş birliğin için sana teşekkür etme fırsatı hiç bulamamıştı {name} von Valancius. Yeniden Yapılanma'nın başarıya ulaşmasında oynadığın rol unutulmayacak."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
